attributes.action: Show TV Programmes about Black achievers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am writing to request your full support on submitting my ideas of television programmes about black achievers from the past and present. It is a sad fact that the achievements of black people have been overlooked and ignored. I believe that very little progress has been addressed upon the issues about, past and present black achievers who have contributed their own successes in Education, The Arts, Media, Commerce, Politics, Agriculture, Architecture, Science, Inventions, Explorers, and the Military within cultural society.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
